entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets beginning early in the evening and ending after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
